document_data.name: ''Runic Shield''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Runic shield''''' was a magically enchanted [[shield]] usable by [[sorcerer]]s.
document_data.Powers: ''Runic shields'' were inscribed with magical ''sigils'' that allowed sorcerers to use them with almost no chance of ''spell'' failure. The shield itself provided a +2 defense enchantment when held.
document_data.History: In 1369 DR, one of ''runic shields'' could be found in [[Dwarven Dungeons]] of [[Myth Drannor]] in a chest along with gemstones and an ''eidolon'', a mysterious stone head,  guarded by two [[wraith|wraiths]].
